attributes.action: Close Schools Colleges & Universities in Hull
attributes.additional_details: Hull is now no1 worst city for COVID19 spikes they said schools were not to blame well it seems they are and to slow this down they need to shut them down and fast
attributes.background:
To close schools colleges and universities.
Schools believe our kids are safe in school they are not pubs were to blame for the rise in infections when we can clearly see its education settings

rejection.details:
Under the current national lockdown the Government is not closing businesses or other establishments in particular regions, but you may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Reclose schools and colleges due to increase in COVID-19 cases: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/550846

Require university campuses to close to stop the spread of COVID-19: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/552512
